name: UpdateListMemberships
description:
Add or remove records from a manual or snapshot list.

This tool is used to add and/or remove records from a manual or snapshot list in the HubSpot CRM. It facilitates managing list memberships by updating existing records according to specified changes.

parameters.name: list_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ILS ID of the MANUAL or SNAPSHOT list to update.

value_schema.description: The **ILS ID** of the `MANUAL` or `SNAPSHOT` list.

parameters.name: record_ids_to_remove
parameters.description: An array of record IDs to remove from the list. Each ID should be a string.

parameters.name: record_ids_to_add
parameters.description: An array of record IDs to be added to the specified list. Ensure these records are already created in the system.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The **ILS ID** of the `MANUAL` or `SNAPSHOT` list.

value_schema.description: The **ILS ID** of the `MANUAL` or `SNAPSHOT` list.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
